data.title: About us – PELISTERKA
data.text:
The main objective of the management of AD Pelisterka leading role in the Macedonian market and increasing competitive ability to deliver services and top quality products in the field of proizvdostvo natural carbonated mineral water, proizvdostvo CO2, wine and juices in accordance with user requirements, technical standards and legal regulations. To achieve its goals and objectives of Pelisterka AD decided to implement processes and service management system, quality management process in accordance with the requirements of ISO 9001: 2008 and according to the principles of the Codex Alimentarius CAC / RCP 1-1969 Rev.4-2003 standard.

The organization is constantly working to maintain the trust among customers by promoting a high degree of transparency in the ethics of action. Pelisterka AD favoritism is committed to the continued development of the company using the latest marketing strategies.

HISTORY

In 1961, the court changed its name to “Wine Vine Plant VINE Petilep”. The organization had two departments separately for grape production department for the production of wine, fruit, brandy, juices. In 1968 the organization expanded its production of mineral water and CO2. The organization goes through several reorganizations, and in 1976 organized the work of organizations without a work unit.

In 1993, he made adjustments to existing laws and has the name “Agricultural Industry Plant Breeders’ Bitola. The transformation of social capital in the private wine AIK Bitola on 24.12.2001 converted into a private limited company with 100% of the share capital under the name of the breeder Pelisterka AD.

Today, the production of mineral water takes place in two production plants located in the village. Medzitlija, near the Greek border, etc. Medzitlija plant 1 and plant second Medzitlija winery is located at the entrance of Bitola.

Medzitlija 1 plant was built in 1965 and covers VC. an area of 23,121 m2 with a building area of 2328 m2.

Based plant Medzitlija 2 set in 1968. Today, the plant covers an area of 24,807 m2 with a building area of 4,000 m2.

TODAY

The cellar was built in 1961 and today occupies an area of 2008 m2. The basement has a capacity of 5,000,000 liters / year. Processed following varieties: Riesling, Pinot, Merlot, table grapes Muscat Hamburg, generally provided that from its own vineyards. In 2008 Pelisterka AD. and started production of carbonated drinks, which rounds off its range of refreshments. Thanks to water quality, premium raw materials, technology and knowledge of employees, juices Pelisterka AD. quickly became a recognizable brand on the Macedonian market. In 2009 Pelisterka AD. He introduced the management system of quality control ISO 9001/2008 and HACCP. In 2009 Pelisterka AD. and started production of carbonated mineral water under the brand of love. Water for balanced mineral composition is a continuation Pelisterka quality. In 2010 Breeder Pelisterka AD changed its name to Pelisterka AD. The company designed its own protective bottle, which meets the most demanding customers. Beautiful modern design and superior quality, only continues the tradition of the dominance of the market in Macedonia. The factory in Medzitlija began operating one line for filling glass bottles, which will be able to meet the growing demand of consumers.
